name: Super Robot Fighting Man Club
description:
"Super Robot Fighting Man Club ": Robot Wrestling Game is a robot ring fight game and wrestling game where you will play the role of ring fighter.

This Game brings to you a Robot War fighting game where you as a Superhero Robot or a transforming Steel robot have to fight with bots of enemies who are trying to spread evilness in your city. 
Futuristic Legacy Wars are going to take place, where you, the Futuristic Robot Tiger or the Futuristic robot Fighting has to destroy tanks with your Metal Wings.


Game Features:

• Real world Robots Gym fight tournament.
• Feel the heat of wrestling game as robot fighting machine.
• Breathtaking action of superheroes robot vs steel robot.
• Fight with heavy weight & strong Robot fighters in tournament.
• Level up by defeating world legendary fighters in Robot GYM tournament
